modShortDescription: Automatic shotgun ROF increase. Makes the automatic shotgun much more fun.
modDescription:
Automatic shotgun ROF increase. Makes the automatic [shotgun](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) much more fun.
